section.title: rule.add
section.para:
route.add allows to add new rule to SCCP routing engine. For structure of Rule refer to
section. route.add command supports three main options:

row.entry: Indicates that following options must be intepreted as part of pattern definition.
Indicates that following options must be intepreted as part of translation definition.
Indicates that following options are part of mtp-info definition.

section.title: Pattern options
section.para: -p option can be followed by following options:

listitem.para: Value indicating type of translation. It is not mandatory, if absent assumed value is "-1". It requires integer argument.

Specifies numberingplan to be used by SCCP to aid it in determinig correct network system. It is not mandatory. It requires one of enumerated values as argument: UNKNOWN,ISDN_TELEPHONY,DATA,TELEX,MERITIME_MOBILE,LAND_MOBILE,ISDN_MOBILE.
Specifies nature of address to indicate scope of address. It is not mandatory. It requires one of enumerated values as argument: SPARE,SUBSCRIBER,UNKNOWN,NATIONAL,INTERNATIONAL.
Specifies string representation of number(digits). It is mandatory and requires argument.
Specifies subsystem number. It is not mandatory, if absent assumed value is "-1"". It requires integer argument.

section.title: MTP info options
section.para: -m is optional. It must be followed by following options:

listitem.para: Specifies name of mtp linkset. It is mandatory, requires string argument.
Specifies originating point code. It is mandatory, requires integer argument.
Specifies adjacent point code. It is mandatory, requires integer argument.
Specifies signal link selector. It is mandatory, requires integer argument.
